title: 60. You're Not For Everyone, DMK, A Community Mindset + Red Flags in Professional Lines with Modern Skin Therapy.
description:
Hi Roomies,

In this episode I'm talking with licensed esthetician, Jessibella of Modern Skin Therapy! We chat about what to look for when choosing a professional line, DMK, treating acne, recommend homecare, how to have a community over competition mindset, recommending homecare and how Jessibella became a spa owner. 

If you enjoyed this episode, please share this episode and leave us a 5 star review on Apple podcasts! It means the world and really helps me to prioritize the podcast!
